resources.string: Yus boet, we need to find seed peers to\nhelp us connect to the network...

This app is an implementation of the Bitcoin protocol and it is released under the terms of the MIT license. 

You can find the source code to the application here:
github.com/boetchain/android-bitcoin-node

Alot of this project is based on code from the projects below, with out them none of this would be possible:

Bitcoin Core
Bitcoinj
ABcore
